# bitRate

**Instance Property**

The bit rate, in bits per second.

## Declaration

```swift
var bitRate: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value only applies when encoding.

## Getting Bit Rate Properties

- **applicableEncodeBitRates**: An array of bit rates the framework applies during encoding according to the current formats and settings.
- **availableEncodeBitRates**: An array of all bit rates the codec provides when encoding.
- **availableEncodeChannelLayoutTags**: An array of all output channel layout tags the codec provides when encoding.
- **bitRateStrategy**: A key value constant the framework uses during encoding.
